m_szDocSumamry: 2013 Europe EV Sales Report Originally published on EV Obsession . A reader recently pointed out to me a little EV Sales blogspot that had been off my radar. The guy who runs the blog, Jose Pontes, actually comes up with estimates for European-wise electrified vehicle (EV) sales by tracking down EV registrations in as many countries as possible. He also estimates sales for China and Japan . So, in total, he’s covering the top 4 EV markets. Needless to say, I’m going to start utilizing this data for my own reports. I’m also going to reach out to Jose to see about potential collaboration. For no
